message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation.
Your starting offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's make things a bit more even, considering the money loses value quickly for both of us.
I understand your point, but the inflation hits me harder. Let's meet in the middle.
This is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We need to agree soon before the inflation eats away at the value.
